values: <font size="-2">Matt comes today & im really excited =)</font>

<font size="-2">my family sucks.. why cant they just be happy for me and let me do what i want to do. I mean you got to live your life.. let me live mine. but yea. im alittle down and it sucks. the end.</font>

<font size="-2">so last night I had a dream I ordered 2 apple pie's and 2 hashbrowns from McDonalds.. & this morning I woke up with a huge ass headache. today im on the mission to clean my room.. because it def needs to get done before Matthew comes over. um i hate working on the weekends. Id rather be in my bed sleeping. Im also starting to feel like im gonna miss a few select people when i move. 

Yesterday I went shopping and got a bunch of new shirts.. i love them.</font>

I really do not want to wear a white dress to graduation. I have 8 tickets. which means I can invite 8 people. People Im inviting. 1. Matthew 2. Pops 3. Brother Bob 4. Granny 5. Tom Yesterday was more then I could handle. I went to HighSchool. Home. Starbucks. Target. Marshells. HighSchool. Monique's house. Candy Store. 7 eleven. Marshells. CW. Target. Applebee's. Monique's House. Walmart. Home. Picked up Wendy. Richmond. Red Hot & Blue. Gas Station. Home. Tru gangsta.
some teacher @ school told me today I had a cute smile and she loved when i came to visit her and that i should stop in to visit her more often hah.. so theres the Shelley Smile.
<font size="-2">um. im so tired of dumb shit. argh. i need to find a box.</font>

er. so all ive been doing latley is my ceramics class. working out. and work.. & im so tired. also for some reason ive been losing a lot of stuff and forgetting things. =/ um Matt is coming to visit me May 28th =) & im offically moving June 19th.
shelley.

<font size="-2">I had a talk with my Granny today.. sometimes I feel like she knows every move im gonna make.  I was about to walk out of her house and she said to me.. so do you plan on moving to Tennesse when you get out of school.. yet I have not told ANYONE that im planning on moving.. she knew excatly what i was thinking. so me and her had a talk about it and I think now she has made me relize a lot about life.. and I love to death and Im going to miss her so much.


yep.</font>

<font size="-2">So.. monday and tuesday I trained this new girl as a hostess.. after an hour I was completely tired of her. All she did was talk about everything that happened to her since she could walk. I couldnt take it. I dont understand at all why girl's have babies so young. She just turned 17 and due to have a baby in December. anyway.. 

I was laying in my bed this morning. just before i got up to get ready for class.. I over hear my dad, brother, and his friend talking.. and one of them asked my dad this "did she cry?" at that momment i  was hurt but at the same time really proud of myself. The reason being.. last night I was sitting in my room watching tv.. my dad is drunk and comes to my door and yells at me to get in the living room so he can talk to me.. so i go its 11pm, im gonna finish this movie and go to bed. He then says "No you're not, you're going to get your ass in here and we are going to talk" So i tell him we can talk later. He refuses tho and continues to tell me right now get in here. So i sit there trying not to cry so he wouldnt know that i was hurt by any of his actions. to show him I wasnt weak.. and he tells me that who do I think I am, a badass or something that cant talk to her father. and i sat there silently until he left from rambling on.


um you cant change how a person feel about something. only the person can change how they feel.</font>
<font size="-2">I laid there all alone telling myself I was strong and not to cry.</font>

<font size="-2">I got a hair cut like 4 days ago. Im tired and I feel so lost. 

goodnight.</font>

<font size="-2">so I finally got a gym pass.. and Ive started to work out. & i love it! 

um on my way to school today I thought about the Poe museum..

Im going to lay out. Then Ill prob watch a movie.. hopefully clean my room.. then Im not sure hah

oh and I had subway today!! =D</font>

4am. phone call from Cassie.
Shelley can you come pick me up on Camp Rd. The cops are here and I need someone to drive me home.
430am. I arrive @ the scene.
The cop tells me how Cassie is in no trouble and to let her parents know the situation. So I leave to take Cassie home. She asks me to take her to her Aunt's house.
5am. I arrive @ her Aunt's house. 530am. I arrive back home & get in bed. 545am. The cop knocks on my door.
He asks where Cassie is @ and I tell him how I dropped her off @ her Aunt's house. He refuses to belive me & he starts yelling @ me that she is in my house. I tell him no I took her home. Then he tells me he is going to charge me for all this stuff. Because Cassie lied to him & told him I was her step sister. So I tell him where I dropped Cassie off @. It was so late tho and I was so tired I told him the wrong way and didnt relize it till about 10 mins later so I call 411 and get the police department number and then get the cop to call me so I can tell him. He answers the phone saying "Cassie" and I like no this is Shelley. He was like oh ok. I told him how I gave him the wrong directions and retold him the right ones. He tells me he is in the driveway and I say ok and he hangs up.
6am. I go back to bed. 6pm. I go to Cassie's work.
I start talking to Cassie and she tells me the cop never came to her house last night and never spoke to her after I had picked her up earlier. she tells me that he had called and left her a message to call him back. Cassie also tells me her Aunt had called the police looking for her right after I had picked her up. That's when the cop told her aunt that Cassies step sister "me" had picked her up. Cassie's aunt tells the cop that she doesnt have a sister that drives. So that was when the cop called in my plates, got my address and came to my house looking got Cassie, so he could charge her for a curfew violation.
Anyway that was my lovely morning. Today sucked @ work. People were bitches as always, wanting only what they want. I so glad Im leaving this place. Pictures of me. It's what I do when im bored.
erm. where do you plan on being in 10 years?

<font size="-2">=) I finally had some subway today after about 2 weeks of not having it.. gosh it was so good! um Im in the process of making a scupture in my ceramics class.. and its gonna be the shit. and well I was planning on working @ the great wolf lodge.. but now ive decided not too.. erm I miss Matthew a lot. =/</font>

<font size="-2">um so i got back from TN Tuesday night.. my plane was delayed so i sat @ the airport for like 2 hours by myself. which kinda sucked. but the whole week made up for it. Ive finally come to the conclusion that I wanna be with Matt forever. Even tho there was stuff in the past that didnt go so well, its something that happened and isnt going to change so why not look past it and try again from the beginning. I loved waking up with him beside me those 6 days =) and I cant wait until that happens again when he comes over here in May.</font>

lalala.. so I asked Jared to make up a scavengar hunt for me to go on.. so he gave me this list of items to take pictures of. 1. Cow 2. Tree 3. Bird 4. Water 5. Spider and well heres what i came back with.

one week until i visit matthew =D !! heck yea & i cant wait to hop onboard the aircraft and voom voom through the clouds =P anywayyyyyyyyy im so freakin siked & excited. um soo i still havent been back to see the assistant principal about my suspension. um my clay pot im in the process of making is being a douche bag.. I attended a food handlers class today so i could get my food handlers card for work.. so hopefully i wont have anymore "food handlers vacations" hrm well im tired and coughing like a sick infested cow with 3 legs and no tail.. so im gonna try to take a nap before work. me being an idiot..

soo today rocked hardcore.. i woke up & met Jared @ Maymont. That place is really awesome. We walked around and took pictures. saw some really cool fish. & a really cute sea otter.. he really liked me. it was like an instant connection. but anyway walkign up and down hills got annoying so we stopped & got some lemonaide.. then Jared pushed me in a bush and i fell on the ground and scratched myself up alittle bit, but i got back up and we continued walking. then after awhile Jared got thirsty and he asked what i did with the lemonaide.. and well i didnt have any idea what happen to it but i think i prob dropped it when i fell in the bush. ldjhfdo it sucked.. but we kept walking and taking pictures and bullshitting about wild goats. then we stopped and laid down a blanket and we just chilled there.. it was awesome. then 5pm came and the park was closing so we left and went to this place called extra billy's.. it wasnt all that great but i had a fun time there... then we chilled some more.. jareds car started being dumb so thats when i left and journeyed home from the great day. pictures...

er work really sucked tonight. i bruised my foot so bad. & it hurts more than words can explain. & another night of my father being an assholejerkfacetwatassdumbirrograntrudenoncaringdickhead. yea. >edit< thanks for talking to me tonight Jared & making me feel better. I needed it!

Shelley has IN SCHOOL SUSPENSION/ AFTER SCHOOL DETENTION for 2 days. dskjdfisufhsd why do administrators have to be such dicks. jesus calamity.. whatever tho im just gonna take my laptop to school and watch DVDS for 3 hours. i love my life. I havent watch unsolved mysteries in 2 weeks. i NEED my unsolved mystery fix immediately. &my tummy hurts.
la la la la la.. well. this week was fun. im def not feelin the whole work thing this weekend. argh.. anyway um im tired. how shelley feels right now.

I killed a skunk last night. I fixed my coil pot in ceramics class. Im getting a Sony Cybershot DSC-T1 =D I lost my alarm. I went and ate breakfest with Julian @ Friendlys this morning. best mother flippin breakfest place ever. & its snowing.

I tried thinking. but failed at doing that.. so now i guess well i dont know. blah.. i also had a crazy ass dream last night. i was DRY-humping a big black lady in the butt & pulling her weave out at the same time. anyway. its raining outside. p-time is over. theres a few things around my room i need to pick up. my night sucked all last night until jared got online and made me smile by being him. i love the friendship we have! it is better than a box of fruity pebbles. the reason my night sucked.. well when i got home my dad was a complete dick about everything. drunk/high and whatever else he was doing.. anyway he told me how worthless i was.. how my family loved me but not who i was.. he bitched about me going to see Matt in TN.. but i think im slowly becoming a stronger person from all his rants and raves @ me.. i dont cry as much anymore and i dont take anything he says about what he thinks of me to heart anymore. because i know that i am a good person.. and i know that i will make it somewhere in life no matter how much he trys to stop me from growing up. ive been through so much shit in the past and i think getting away from his ass will be the last major shit ill have to get through. and i cant wait till that day comes. I keep your picture by my side in my heart is where you hide holding you so close, you feel my heart beat i want to tell you how you are so amazinly sweet and i start to think of what we may be a simple kiss of the highest degree i begin to smile like never before i love this feeling but wish it was 10 times more my eyes shut as i begin to dream a dream of you, i want to cream you make my life so complete that i never have a problem falling asleep. with your picture by my side.
<font size="-2">blah.. im so happy.. but someone broke my pot in ceramics class and my family is a bunch of assholes.</font>

I got 55 dollars!!!!!! & a empty plastic Starbucks cup =) hrm.. i think im gonna write a lot since im bored outta my earballs.. anyway i came home today and threw my laundry in the washer machine I then skipped over to my granny's house & said hello to her =) i then came back home and put some soup in the fridge.. Shelley will def be diggin in that shit when she gets home from work! hah but now im just chillin until then.. unsolved mysteries will be coming on in 5 mins also so.. ill be occupied with that =D hrm.. today is gonna be a good day or so i hope heh.. ive already burned 87 calories.. & 4.8 grams of fat... walked 1.2 miles.. & taken 3254 steps!!! >start Jared dedication< Jared Thaddeus Rogersface the only kid i know who would wear NEW! NewBalances in a river... MY IDOL!!!!!! >end Jared dedication<
yeah bitch my hair owns me. so stfu =) seven thirty seven coming outta the sky!! oh! wont you take me down to memphis on a midnight ride!
<font size="-2">so im not a lesbain.. but i do like lesbains.</font>

sooooo I made a whistle today in ceramics class... it's so awesome !@ um last night i cheated on Bucker's.. sorrry loveer.. and i went to hooters with Tim.. =) im getting my car inspected today. YAYYY & im hopefully going to finish cleaning my room.. maybe some furniture movement.. possiblyy hah yea. so my flu flew away !@ i hope for good.. argh !! I met this new boy named Matt in my math class.. matt... weird huh. hah but yea and we talked about how we both had the flu the same week!!! so he's my flu buddy.. and i dont know why i decided to put this in my journal but i guess im just dumb? noway haha im coooooool. as fuck. i need to get a cable cord for my TELEVISION. i need to get a new BELT for my waist. i need to get 100 dollars for my NY trip.. argh fuckkkkkkk & i need to finish my taxes.. !@#$%^& OH snap & i watched Resident Evil: Apocalypse with John last night.. AWESOME movie.!

er well... I have the fluuu buggg.. ive been stuck @ home for a week.. yay. um during the week a lot of shit happened.. anyway trying to get everything straight. my highlight was finding out i have another brother.. his name is Keith.. he's the same age as me and lives in NY cool huh. yea i thought so.. um im making moreeee jelllo yay. ok i think this is it for now.. ill write some later.. =)

<font size="-2">i haven't updated in awhile so i figured id add a few things that have been going on with me.. first, Wendy came home today. and her b-day is also tomorrow...i have like the whole week off =D and i get out of school wed. um Im going to a Three Days Grace concert on Monday.. Im kinda feeling like not going now but i already bought a ticket so whatever... Im fucking tired and need sleep...


Im going to MD the 27th !  Im def gonna visit the aquairium (sp?) =D & go to QUIZNOS.

um i think thats all.. except, i hate work.</font>

<font size="-2">.... so Im frezzing. but i want it to snow GR.. I ran over a deer.. and now my car is fucked up more.. Im too busy and tired to take it to get fixxed.. so im sure it will get worse.  I got a gamecube! 

last night Nic and I went to eat dinner and discuss some stupid plans he had... when i got home I went right to bed. I got straight A's on my report card. I dont feel like doing anything.. because i feel like shit.  I cried today.

Im going to finish watch Spiderman 2 and take a nap.

baby when you touch me.. I can feel how much you love me.</font>

<font size="-2">sweet... well yesterday I went to VCU in Richmond.. to watch this cheerleading competition for extra credit in English class.  after the competition Cassie and I went to CaryTown and bought Dawn a bday present... we then came back home and baked cupcakes for her... we left, picked up some balloons and a rose. then finally we go to the resturant in Williamsburg.  The party was an awesome good time.  After the party we went to the bowling alley... Nicole.. me and this guy named Andrea from Italy we met, did the limbo.. and the eletric slide... I won the first bowling game... and i dont even rmmeber how many points i scored.. but I won haha..Today I went over to Dawn's house and me.. her, her sister, and Michael went down to Vabeach... had a lotta fun =) and I got some new gear! haha Now i have to clean my room and do some laundry since i havent been home all weekend blah


vabeach... =/</font>

i made one last attempt to see if Matt even wanted me to come to TN to visit him.. the response i got back wasnt of one that seemed not to excited about me going over there so... now I give up.. move on? start something new. as much as i hate it.. just remember what we had. Thanksgiving was yesterday.. I didnt visit family.. I didnt eat turkey.. I didnt tell one person Happy Thanksgiving but Dawn... Wendy called me.. havent yet returned that phone call.. not sure if i should. Ive herd that she is down in Georgia now.. still too far away to go fishing on the weekends. I want to go to starbucks... so thats where im off too this morning... maybe Dawn will go with me, shes seem to be the only one thats been there for me through my ups and downs lately.. which ive had many.
<font size="-2">sometimes I wish i had of died.</font>

sweet.. so school lasted like 2 hours today =) during my government class.. Mr Steffy.. asked me in front of the whole class if i have ever been in love before.. I sat there staring off and all i could do was just cry =/ weird how one question can upset you to the point of being uncontrollable with your emotions. after school i drove to subway.. the normal routine stop haha.. and Michael pulls up next to me and was like whats up pimpin.. going to subway? so i was like yeah you paying? haha so we went in and im guessing it had just opened.. the woman took about 15 mins setting up everything and we got our subs.. sat down and ate then i left and went home.. i had told my granny id be there around 10ish.. well i didnt get home till 11 and it was raining so we just decided not to go out today.. i need to do my laundry.. and um clean my room up. tomorrow's THANKSGIVING... what are you thankful for? me... im thankful for still being alive. i look at only having a 30% chance of living as.. a miracle to still be here.

so yeah my tooth hurt like shit last night... I talked to Max on the phone for about 2 hours.. its really nice having somebody you can explain how you feel to them when you arent always in the happiest moods. I talked to Matt today and asked him what he got for his birthday and all... and then i asked him what he wanted. he told me some new tires for his car, so i was like well ill get you one of the 4 you're going to need, so I went out to walmart after school and i saw tires were like 38057307508365 dollars and plus i didnt knwo what size he needed so i thought about gettign him alittle lawn mower tire, then i was like wait ill get him a little BIKE tire!! haha so thats what I ended up getting him. while we were also talking he told me he had some chocolate cake and chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream and i was like dood i remember when we were like 5 and I came over for your bithday and had chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream for the first time.. ever since then ive loved it. and i acutally had some last night ! but it was a milkshake one =) so tonight my family is going to hooters to have a hooterific time.. i asked them to get me the grilled cheese platter.. but i highly doubt they will =/ I failed at inviting people to Dawns birthday =( i managed to find 3 people and thats when i was like oh hell ok i quit English class........ yeah im failing? there goes my straight A good student award. HA Im so depresssed.. i feel like i could possible have another stroke? ill be visiting the doctor sometime next week for test =/

its um 7:14 EST and im sitting here trying to come to some conclusion as to what the fuck im doing up.. last night i went to one of my brother's football games for like 10 mins because I was feeling like shit.. after that I went over to Cassie's and chilled there for another 10 mins.. then i just decided to come back home because i was sooo tired.. Thrusday when i went up to DC..Cassie and me walked around some malls, she ended up buying so much shit.. and me on the other hand got 2 things haha... a 2 dollar "girls gone wild" hat and pair of underoos that said I love.. and underneath that i had them made to say Mattress =) cause I love him umm.. I need to go to the doctor really bad cause i feel like there is something really wrong, but im scared to tell anyone because they will run every test a scientist has ever made on me.. fucking shit my family keeps telling me to go the the medical college of virginia.. and everytime they talk to me about it i just dont say anything because its not what i want to do =/ and i dont want to hurt their feelings and make them mad at me for wanting to have my own life and being able to decide what I want to do.

sooo.. I went to school today.. I have a 98 in TCE.. 95 in English... and a B+ in Government. Im so tired. Im giong to DC on Thrusday... Christmas shopping? Dawn's Bday shopping? yeah I wish.. too bad im BROKE argh I am SO lonely.. I havent felt like this in so long but i feel like i used to before i met Matt sometimes and its really starting to get to me.. I miss how everything used to be.. I miss it so fucking much.. this morning on the way to school I was listening to Aerosmith's "I Don't Want to Miss a Thing" song and I just started crying.. WTF is wrong with me =/

im sitting here drinking orange soda. my head kinda hurts.. and im tired. i dont know where my boyfriend is... am I stupid for wanting to know? I really need to finish my stupid cloning paper =/ and fold my clothes. I broke my camera today!#@$%^ um.. I need to stop spending money cause im broke. gah i want a new job. and ive felt more lonely these past 2 weeks than i have in my whole life. why? im going to bed goodnight.

blah.. well today I skipped class since its Veterans Day and all, I felt the need not to attend school. So Dawn, Michael, and I drove around cause we coudln't think of anythign to do. but i soon changed that when i told them we should go ride the ferry arcoss the James River and back.. so we rode the ferry. After that we went to McD's and I got a happy meal, we then went to Michael's house and I watched Unsolved Mysteries =) Michael dropped Dawn and I back off at my car.. I found out i had left my headlights on all day I had to call Michael and get him to jump my car!@#$% Then me and Dawn came back to my house and now we're just chillin. OH! and some other things that have happened this week were that at school the other day Dawn threw a whole cup of ICE cold water on me and my Bob Marley shirt... I was cold the rest of the day ! and yesterday I laid in a big wad of fucking bubblegum, and it got all over my ducky sweatshirt.. and!!!!! Michael put in my brand spanking new CD player =D so now i can finally pimp in the del sol.. we aslo ate at IHop, Red Hot and Blue, and Subway.. i aslo finally cleaned my BEDROOM !@#$%^ and i think thats it.. im tired and i have to go to work today.. I love Steven Matthew Harber Pictures... Michael putting in the CD player. Michael trying to hit the side of the Del Sol.

<font size="-2">well, i supose im gonna start writing in my journal once more.  Ive kinda been busy with work and school lately so i havent really done much.  I still very much love Matt,  sometimes its hard with the distance between us, but its just something you have to deal with.  School's still not even 1/4 through, which really sucks because i dont want to be here any more.. Ive been trying to find a new job with medical stuff and whatnot, but that hasnt been very sucessful =/  But i applied at this new Home Depot store they're building cause i want to pimp the little Home Depot shirts they wear. I cleaned my room, its real pretty, and im super proud of myself for not being such a lazy ass =D  Since Dawn's came back to the Virginia State me and her have become bonnie and clyde.. i seem to think sometimes tho we tend to get on people's nerves, but it doesnt matter because we are cool as shit. anywaytime for breakfest.</font>
My new daily schedule... 6:00 : wake up. 6:30 : go to school. 12:30 : leave school. 1:00 : running. 3:30 : go to work. and somewhere inbetween.. call Mattress =)
<font size="-2">shut up you bitch ass nigger.. Dawn  coming back home =D</font>
